title: QR Code Flow for Merchants
description: How merchants can accept payments by presenting a QR code to the patron.

children.value: Connecting with patrons using our QR Code Flow requires the merchant integration to create a
and present a QR Code for the patron to scan.
The sequence diagram below indicates the expected flow of behavior between the patron, the Point of Sale (POS) and Centrapay.

props.code:
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber

    participant Patron
    participant POS
    participant Centrapay

    POS->>Centrapay: Create Payment Request

    note over POS: Present QR Code

    Patron->>POS: Scan QR Code

    par
        loop
            POS->>Centrapay: Poll for Payment Confirmation
        end

        Patron->>Centrapay: Pay Payment Request
    end

    Note over POS: ✅ Display Successful Payment
    Note over Patron: ✅ Display Successful Payment

children.value: note over POS: Present QR Code
and presents a QR code to the Patron on a customer-facing display.
The QR code decodes to a URL of the form
The patron scans the QR code using a Centrapay-enabled app.
While the POS continues to poll, the patron
via their Centrapay integrated app. When the Payment Request status is
, the POS stops polling and displays confirmation of the successful payment.
